HIV self-tests to be available at pharmacies and give result in 15 mins https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/hiv-self-tests-to-be-be-be-abailable-at-pharmacies-and-pharmacies-and-give-result-in-15-mins/vtrjixyd2vhrtcqh6slxo7p2uq/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/hiv-self-tests-to-be-be-be-abailable-at-pharmacies-and-pharmacies-and-give-result-in-15-mins/vtrjixyd2vhrtcqh6slxo7p2uq/ Experts say it is an important step in reducing the stigma associated with the disease. Fri, 04 Apr 2025 07:42:59 +0000 A test for HIV can now be done quickly and cheaply. Photo / 123RF
Complaint over teaching tikanga Māori in law schools rejected https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/complaint-complaint-teaching-tikanga-maori-inlaw-schools-rejected/e435t3nxffa5hjrqw72w72w63x666i/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/complaint-complaint-teaching-tikanga-maori-inlaw-schools-rejected/e435t3nxffa5hjrqw72w72w63x666i/ But the select committee also put a limit on how much cultural education was required. Fri, 04 Apr 2025 07:32:15 +0000 The changes would require a compulsory law course on tikanga Māori under the legal education curriculum. Photo / 123rf
Man arrested following assault on parking warden https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/man-Arrested-following-Assault-Ans-on-parking-warden/i2a6qluuhzgcjbxmxmxmx7modbilki/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/man-Arrested-following-Assault-Ans-on-parking-warden/i2a6qluuhzgcjbxmxmxmx7modbilki/ The liquid stained the warden's skin, clothing, and work equipment, police say. Minister Andrew Hoggard’s sister lobbied him opposing tougher baby formula rules https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/minister-andrew-hoggards-sister-sister-lobbied-him-opposing-tougher-baby-formula-rules/v6cy22uxyjbvdookyjbvdookjv3i7bqm/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/minister-andrew-hoggards-sister-sister-lobbied-him-opposing-tougher-baby-formula-rules/v6cy22uxyjbvdookyjbvdookjv3i7bqm/ Andrew Hoggard’s sister advised against tougher infant formula standards. Photo / RNZ / Angus Dreaver
Dargaville man Cory Olsen’s sentencing for car thefts and 23 burglaries has been adjourned https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/dargaville-man-man-cory-olsens-sentencing-for-car-car-thefts-and-par------------b-burglaries-has-adjourne/i3l3l3l3o275xvbqbloamye2s4vkue/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/dargaville-man-man-cory-olsens-sentencing-for-car-car-thefts-and-par------------b-burglaries-has-adjourne/i3l3l3l3o275xvbqbloamye2s4vkue/ Shannon PitmanSome people were burgled of sentimental jewellery that could never be replaced. Fri, 04 Apr 2025 07:00:00 +0000 Cory Olsen committed 23 burglaries across Northland and stole multiple cars. He will be sentenced in the Whangārei District Court in July.
Girl, 11, mistaken as woman: Director of Mental Health launches probe after child restrained, injected with antipsychotics https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/girl-11-mistaken-as-woman-director-of-mental-health-health-nealth-launches-probe-after-after-child-child-child-child-child-rested-with-antipsychotics/j5z76cwfbndijev7g3g3hktggl2m/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/girl-11-mistaken-as-woman-director-of-mental-health-health-nealth-launches-probe-after-after-child-child-child-child-child-rested-with-antipsychotics/j5z76cwfbndijev7g3g3hktggl2m/ Benjamin PlummerThe young girl was handcuffed, restrained and injected with antipsychotic medication. Photo / Michael Craig
